alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 10:04AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Alcovy River at New Hope Road near Grayson affecting Gwinnett and Walton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alcovy River at New Hope Road near Grayson. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of the woodlands upstream and downstream from the river gauge at New Hope Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
